channel.title: CVE Feed for oroinc -- orocommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for oroinc -- orocommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-32064|2024-08-02T15:03:28.950Z -- oroinc -- orocommerce
item.description: OroCommerce package with customer portal and non authenticated visitor website base features. Back-office users can access information about Customer and Customer User menus, bypassing ACL security restrictions due to insufficient security checks. This issue has been patched in version 5.0.11 and 5.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32065|2024-08-02T15:03:28.901Z -- oroinc -- orocommerce
item.description: OroCommerce is an open-source Business to Business Commerce application built with flexibility in mind. Detailed Order totals information may be received by Order ID. This issue is patched in version 5.0.11 and 5.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-48296|2024-08-02T21:23:39.499Z -- oroinc -- orocommerce
item.description: OroPlatform is a PHP Business Application Platform (BAP). Navigation history, most viewed and favorite navigation items are returned to storefront user in JSON navigation response if ID of storefront user matches ID of back-office user. This vulnerability is fixed in 5.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-48296|2024-06-04T17:27:34.578Z -- oroinc -- orocommerce
item.description: OroPlatform is a PHP Business Application Platform (BAP). Navigation history, most viewed and favorite navigation items are returned to storefront user in JSON navigation response if ID of storefront user matches ID of back-office user. This vulnerability is fixed in 5.1.4.
